identity.name: Fastenmonat Kalender
identity.visual_mood: Clean Geometric Islamic, Breathable Space, Organic Textures
identity.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default (Paper/Sand vibes) with Dark Mode Toggle (Deep Midnight)

usage_rules.headings: Use Playfair Display for all Page Titles, Prayer Names, and 'Iftar' callouts.
usage_rules.body: Use Inter for all UI elements, inputs, lists, and calendar grids.
usage_rules.numbers: Use Tabular nums (tabular-nums) for prayer times and countdowns to prevent jitter.

layout.container: max-w-md mx-auto md:max-w-2xl lg:max-w-4xl xl:max-w-6xl px-4 md:px-8

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground shadow-lg hover:bg-primary/90 transition-all active:scale-95 rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-medium
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-stone-900 border border-stone-200 shadow-sm hover:bg-stone-50 transition-all rounded-full px-6 py-4

cards.base: bg-white dark:bg-stone-900 border border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800 shadow-[0_2px_8px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] hover:shadow-[0_4px_16px_rgba(0,0,0,0.06)] transition-shadow duration-300
cards.prayer_card: relative overflow-hidden bg-white border border-stone-100 p-6 flex items-center justify-between group

inputs.default: bg-stone-50 border-transparent focus:border-primary/20 focus:bg-white focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary/10 transition-all rounded-xl h-12 px-4

navigation.bottom_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-xl border-t border-stone-100 p-4 flex justify-around z-50 md:hidden
navigation.desktop_sidebar: hidden md:flex flex-col w-64 border-r border-stone-100 h-screen sticky top-0 p-6

phases: 1. Setup Shadcn UI and Tailwind Config with custom colors.
2. Build the 'PrayerTimeContext' to fetch data from Aladhan API.
3. Create the 'Dashboard' with Countdown Timer (use date-fns).
6. Add 'Settings' for City Selection and Language Toggle (i18next).
universal_rules: No generic gradients. Use solid colors or subtle radial glows.
Always use 'Playfair Display' for headers to give the 'Ramadan Journal' feel.
Ensure text contrast is high (Stone-900 on White).
